script:
1). What did you learn at the seminar last night?
Well, they covered the section on marketing. 
The teacher was very experienced.
It was more difficult than I thought.
2). Are you returning tomorrow or the day after?
Yes, it came with a sixty-day guarantee.
I'll probably have lunch with Mr. Jones.
I should be back the day after tomorrow. 
3). I think you should call customer service right away.
No, I'd prefer to work in the personnel department.
No, I'll look through the troubleshooting guide first. 
I think Gary still works in purchasing.
